sentence: The image is an infographic titled "Moms and Social Media in 2012."
sentence_cn: 该图是一张信息图表，标题为“2012 年的妈妈和社交媒体”。

sentence: It provides statistics on how mothers engage with social media and brands online.
sentence_cn: 它提供了母亲如何参与社交媒体和在线品牌的统计数据。

sentence: Here¡¯s a detailed description:
sentence_cn: 以下是详细描述：

sentence: ### Moms Use Social Networks a Lot!
sentence_cn: ### 妈妈们经常使用社交网络！

sentence: - Regular Use:
sentence_cn: - 常规使用：

sentence: - 80% of young moms (expectant/with kids under 8) use social media regularly.
sentence_cn: - 80% 的年轻妈妈（孕妇/孩子 8 岁以下）经常使用社交媒体。

sentence: - 55% of the general online population uses social media regularly.
sentence_cn: - 55% 的一般上网人群经常使用社交媒体。

sentence: - Having Over 200 Facebook Friends:
sentence_cn: - 拥有超过 200 名 Facebook 好友：

sentence: - 52% of young moms.
sentence_cn: - 52% 的年轻妈妈。

sentence: - 32% of the general online population.
sentence_cn: - 占一般上网人口的 32%。

sentence: - Using Social Media While Watching Videos:
sentence_cn: - 观看视频时使用社交媒体：
words: Using Social Media While Watching Videos:

sentence: - 49% of young moms.
sentence_cn: - 49% 的年轻妈妈。

sentence: - 23% of the general online population.
sentence_cn: - 占一般上网人口的 23%。

sentence: ### Platform Usage:
sentence_cn: ### 平台使用情况：

sentence: - Facebook:
sentence_cn: - Facebook：

sentence: - 90% of Latina moms (25-59, with kids 3-18) visited in the past 30 days.
sentence_cn: - 90% 的拉丁裔妈妈（25-59 岁，孩子年龄 3-18 岁）在过去 30 天内访问过。

sentence: - Twitter:
sentence_cn: -推特：

sentence: - 37% of Latina moms visited in the past 30 days.
sentence_cn: - 37% 的拉丁裔妈妈在过去 30 天内访问过。

sentence: ### Moms Are Open to Brands on Social Networks:
sentence_cn: ### 妈妈们对社交网络上的品牌持开放态度：

sentence: - Purchases from Social Recommendations:
sentence_cn: - 通过社交推荐购买：

sentence: - 42% of moms have made a purchase this way.
sentence_cn: - 42% 的妈妈通过这种方式购买商品。

sentence: - 29% of non-moms have done the same.
sentence_cn: - 29% 的非妈妈也做过同样的事情。

sentence: - Following Content Sites:
sentence_cn: - 关注内容网站：

sentence: - 71% of moms frequently or occasionally follow.
sentence_cn: - 71% 的妈妈经常或偶尔关注。

sentence: - 62% of web users in general do this.
sentence_cn: - 总体而言，62% 的网络用户都会这样做。

sentence: - Following Brands from Ads:
sentence_cn: - 通过广告关注品牌：

sentence: - 32% of moms are likely to follow these brands.
sentence_cn: - 32%的妈妈可能会关注这些品牌。

sentence: - 25% of web users are likely to follow.
sentence_cn: - 25% 的网络用户可能会关注。

sentence: ### Moms Are Promoters of Brands on Social Networks:
sentence_cn: ### 妈妈是社交网络上的品牌推广者：

sentence: - Recommendation and Interaction:
sentence_cn: - 推荐互动：

sentence: - 59% of moms recommend brands via social networks, compared to 44% of non-moms.
sentence_cn: - 59%的妈妈通过社交网络推荐品牌，而非妈妈的比例仅为 44%。

sentence: - 49% of moms talk about brands they follow on Facebook; 33% of non-moms do.
sentence_cn: - 49% 的妈妈会谈论她们在 Facebook 上关注的品牌；33% 的非妈妈会谈论她们关注的品牌。

sentence: - 52% of moms link to a brand ad; 40% for non-moms.
sentence_cn: - 52% 的妈妈会链接到品牌广告；非妈妈的比例为 40%。

sentence: - 34% of moms post to a brand's page, compared to 28% of non-moms.
sentence_cn: - 34% 的妈妈会在品牌页面上发布帖子，而非妈妈的比例仅为 28%。

sentence: ### Interaction with Companies:
sentence_cn: ### 与公司互动：

sentence: - Following Brands Due to Interaction:
sentence_cn: - 通过互动关注品牌：

sentence: - 29% of moms interact with authors/contributors as a reason to follow a brand.
sentence_cn: - 29% 的妈妈与作者/贡献者互动，以此作为关注某个品牌的原因。

sentence: - 17% of other women do the same.
sentence_cn: - 其他 17% 的女性也有同样的情况。

sentence: - Belief in Influence:
sentence_cn: - 影响力的信念：

sentence: - 63% of moms believe they can influence companies by voicing opinions.
sentence_cn: - 63% 的妈妈认为她们可以通过发表意见来影响公司。

sentence: - 56% of non-moms believe the same.
sentence_cn: - 56% 的非妈妈也有同样的看法。

sentence: The image concludes with sources from Babycenter, Burst Media Online Insights, Performics, and Mamiverse.
sentence_cn: 该图片的最后来源是 Babycenter、Burst Media Online Insights、Performics 和 Mamiverse。

sentence: The colors used are predominantly pink, blue, and orange, indicating different categories and comparisons.
sentence_cn: 使用的颜色主要是粉色、蓝色和橙色，表示不同的类别和比较。
